DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of Faslodex as secondary-line treatment compared with Arimidex in oestrogen receptor positive postmenopausal advanced breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Faslodex Advanced Breast Cancer Local Chinese Study
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal advanced breast cancer with oestrogen receptor positive Progression under firstline antioestrogen therapy. Lifethreatening metastasis; contraindication to anastrozole >2 regimens of hormonotherapy for advanced breast cancer
